The user enters the target's subconscious by placing a hand on the target's head and extracts any information needed, even if the target has forgotten it or has had it blocked. A special [[Mind Reading Amplification Machine|device]] can be used to decrease the time it takes to read the target's mind and allows other ninja to assist. Memories that have [[Genjutsu Protect|mental blocks]] on them will require longer periods of time to probe through and obtain however. 

Depending on the skill of the user and their level of experience, they will be able to go through days worth of the target's memories in a matter of moments and sift through until they find what they want while others may have to go through each memory in its entirety.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 424, pages 5, 10</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 507, page 8</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In the anime, [[Aoba]] demonstrated the ability to read a target's mind without actually coming into direct physical contact with them.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 227</ref>
